Source.name: EBS Sensor: MFG PO Difference between BPA Description and iProcurement Item Description - Daily
Source.DisplayName: EBS Sensor: MFG PO Difference between BPA Description and iProcurement Item Description - Daily
Source.Description: This is a reason that the autocreate process could fail.

DBPattern.SQLQuery: select 'ME$EBS_MFG_PO_DIFF_BPA_DESC_IP_ITEM_DESC' sensor, to_timestamp(to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss'), 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') entrytime, 'po_header_id:' || s.po_header_id || ', global_agreement_flag:' || s.global_agreement_flag || ', item_description:' || s.item_description || ', po_line_id:' || s.po_line_id || ', org_id:' || s.org_id || ', ip_category_id:' || s.ip_category_id key_data FROM (select ph.po_header_id po_header_id, ph.global_agreement_flag global_agreement_flag, pl.item_description item_description, pl.po_line_id po_line_id, pl.org_id org_id, pl.ip_category_id ip_category_id from apps.po_headers_all ph, apps.po_lines_all pl, apps.po_attribute_values_tlp pavt, apps.icx_cat_attribute_values_tlp icavt where ph.po_header_id = pl.po_header_id and pavt.po_line_id = pl.po_line_id and icavt.po_line_id = pavt.po_line_id and ph.authorization_status = 'APPROVED' and pl.item_id is null and pavt.language = icavt.language and pavt.language = userenv('lang') and ( pavt.description <> pl.item_description OR icavt.description <> pl.item_description ) and rownum < 1000 order by po_header_id desc) s
